title: There was no imam so Kuwaiti led prayer & recited Surah Nas & Al Masad Prayer valid? assim al hakeem
transcript: the next question is in there was no so came up and recited and the is this valid of course it's valid just because he's Kuai he's valid definitely racist what what has his nationality have to do with the question yeah people are so racist nowadays it doesn't make any sense by the way this is also part of ignorance because people don't know what are the pillars what are the mandatory acts what are the sunnas if a non Kuai comes and leads a prayer and reads only the fa whether in or or onlyb the prayer is 100% valid he didn't read anything after fat yes it is Sunnah not only that the prophet sallallah Al wasallam in in Mina he recited in in the first and also in the second in so yeah what did the guy do he did right and he recited the Sunnah and there's no problem in the Salah at all
